text:
@DineshDSouza You are beneath contempt & a perfect example of the perverted views of many trump supporters. Only a sick mind would come up with this scenario.

#H1N1-60.8M cases, 12,469 deaths in 1 year.
#Covid19-over 500k cases, over 20k deaths in less than 3 months. 

This is not a joke.
